metadata.title: CVE-2019-17571 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Included in Log4j 1.2 is a SocketServer class that is vulnerable todeserialization of untrusted data which can be exploited to remotelyexecute arbitrary code when combined with a deserialization gadget whenlistening to untrusted network traffic for log data. This affects Log4jversions up to 1.2 up to 1.2.17.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblog4j1.2-java - 1.2.17-8+deb10u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache-log4j1.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.17-8+deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
